title: Lvl-2 Enchant

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Lvl-2 EnchantThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Enchant lvl-2 amulet
This article is about the spell. For the magic tablet, see Enchant emerald or jade.
Lvl-2 Enchant
Released 24 May 2001 (Update)
Members No
Level 27
Spellbook Standard
Type Utility
Experience 37
Runes 3 1
Casting speed 3 ticks (7 on autocast)
Lectern Demon
Description For use on emerald and jade jewellery
Animation
Sound Effect

Lvl-2 Enchant is a utility spell in the standard spellbook, requiring level 27 Magic to cast. The spell enchants emerald and jade items, primarily jewellery, granting 37 Magic experience when doing so.

This spell can be transferred to a magic tablet by bringing the required runes and a piece of soft clay to a lectern in the study of a player-owned house, granting the same experience as casting the spell.

List of items[edit | edit source]

Free-to-play players can only use the spell to enchant the emerald amulet.

In addition, even though the Castle wars bracelet is a free-to-play item, enchanting it requires membership.

Unenchanted Enchanted Profit[e 1]

Jade necklace 673 Necklace of passage 1,182 415
Jade amulet 908 Amulet of chemistry 1,412 410
